solution_line_template: Angie earned {salary} and paid {necessities_cost} for necessities, so she had {salary} - {necessities_cost} = $<<{salary}-{necessities_cost}={left_after_necessities}>>{left_after_necessities} left.
Angie had {remaining_after_taxes} left after paying taxes, so her share of the taxes was {left_after_necessities}- {remaining_after_taxes} = ${taxes_paid} this month.
